Columns.Description: The time (UTC) when this event was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The log category for these events will be 'Command'
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: The client request ID
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The root activity ID
Columns.Name: RootActivityId

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) when this command started
Columns.Name: StartedOn

Columns.Description: The last time this command was updated
Columns.Name: LastUpdatedOn

Columns.Description: The name of the database the command ran on
Columns.Name: DatabaseName

Columns.Description: The state the command ended with, like 'Completed'
Columns.Name: State

Columns.Description: The reason for the failure
Columns.Name: FailureReason

Columns.Description: Total CPU runtime across cluster nodes
Columns.Name: TotalCPU

Columns.Description: Command type. like 'DatabasesShow'
Columns.Name: CommandType

Columns.Description: The name of the application that invoked the command
Columns.Name: ApplicationName

Columns.Description: Resurce consumption for the exuected command
Columns.Name: ResourceUtilization

Columns.Description: Command duration as a string like '00:00:00.0156250'
Columns.Name: Duration

Columns.Description: User that invoked the query
Columns.Name: User

Columns.Description: Principal that invoked the query like 'aaduser=USER_ID;TENANT'
Columns.Name: Principal

Columns.Description: Workload are a means of resource governance for incoming requests to the cluster
Columns.Name: WorkloadGroup

Columns.Description: Text of the invoked command
Columns.Name: Text

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
